structure.unit: Chapter 26 PARK AND RECREATION DEPARTMENT RULES AND REGULATIONS

law.catch_line: Application to Rickenbacker Causeway and Venetian Causeway.

text.section:
Sec. 26-3. Application to Rickenbacker Causeway and Venetian Causeway.
The provisions of this chapter, save and except Rules 3.(a) and (b), 16.(a), 22.(a) and (b), 11.(a), and 7.(c) as stated in hereof, shall be applicable to and enforced by the Metro-Dade Police Department in, about and on Rickenbacker Causeway and Venetian Causeway and all improvements, recreation areas and public property thereof.
